title.rendered: “Escalating Clashes in Judea and Samaria: IDF Responds to Stone-Throwing and Gunfire”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

In recent hours, clashes have developed between Israeli citizens and Palestinians at several sites in the Judea and Samaria region, during which participants threw stones and opened fire. Dozens of Israelis and Palestinians were injured in various ways.

Large IDF and Border Police forces prepared in different areas and used means to disperse demonstrations. As of this hour, all events have ended.

In addition to the forces deployed in the area, a decision was made to reinforce several IDF platoons and additional Border Police units.

Security forces continue to pursue the terrorists who murdered Binyamin Achimeir, may his memory be a blessing.
